mapper.insert: insert into animalReply( desertionNo, email, username, replyContent ) values( #{desertionNo}, #{email}, #{username}, #{replyContent} )
mapper.select: select animalReplyNum, desertionNo, email, username, replyContent, date_format(replyDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as replyDate from animalReply where desertionNo = #{desertionNo} order by animalReplyNum
select count(*) from animalReply where desertionNo = #{desertionNo}
mapper.delete: delete from animalReply where animalReplyNum = #{animalReplyNum} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update animalReply set replyContent = #{replyContent}, replyDate = now() where animalReplyNum = #{animalReplyNum} and email = #{email}
